meanings.sent1: She had a beaucoup of books in her library.
meanings.sent2: There was beaucoup of food at the party.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all those bags was a beaucoup challenge.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river had a beaucoup of water rushing through.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with a beaucoup of gold coins.

meanings.sent1: He had beaucoup friends at the school.
meanings.sent2: There were beaucoup people waiting in line.
meanings.sent3: The cat had beaucoup energy to play all day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a beaucoup of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with a beaucoup of colorful flowers.
